code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import logger from"redux-logger";import rootReducer from"./reducers/root-reducer";import{persistStore}from"redux-persist";var middlewares=[];if(process.env.NODE_ENV==="development"){middlewares.push(logger);}export var store=createStore(rootReducer,applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares));export var persistor=persistStore(store);
